{"id":349538189,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 10 months","timestamp":1591393404,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"240 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/349538189/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Contiguous Array","memory":"82.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findMaxLength(vector<int>& nums) {\n        unordered_map<int, int> diff_map; \n        int count = 0; \n        int ans = 0; \n        diff_map.insert(make_pair(0, -1)); \n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); ++i) {\n            if (nums[i] == 0) {\n                ++count; \n            } else {\n                --count;  \n            }\n            \n            auto it = diff_map.find(count); \n            if (it != diff_map.end()) {\n                ans = max(ans, i - (it -> second)); \n            } else {\n            \n                diff_map.insert(make_pair(count, i)); \n            }\n        }\n        return ans; \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"contiguous-array"}
